sense.def:
A moor
je visoka prostrana pokrajina, poraščena predvsem s travo in resjem.

seg.quote: The mists had vanished from the moor.
He used to go for long walks on the moors.

sense.def:
Kadar čoln
is moored
, je z vrvjo pritrjen na kopno.

seg.quote: Boats were moored on both sides of the river.
